resources.string: We would like to express our sincere gratitude towards those who have help us in the journey of producing this application.\n\nWe would also like to credit the sources that we have used in the making of this application.

The fitness related articles in the dashboard belong to bornfitness.com. Our application does not own nor profit from displaying and providing access to their articles. \n\nOur purpose is to expose the users to more health and fitness related information so as to help users pursuit a healthy lifestyle. Our application only provides an easy way to access these information.

The introduction to the four diets available belong to www.healthline.com. 

The other articles belong to www.livestrong.com 

Our application does not own nor profit from displaying and providing access to their articles. 

The purpose is to introduce users to various diets that are healthy and can help in cutting weight.

Icons made by Freepik (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik) from www.flaticon.com 

 Icons made by Smashicons (https://smashicons.com/" title="Smashicons) from www.flaticon.com 

 Icons made by photo3idea_studio (https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/running_1108721) from www.flaticon.com

resources.string: This feature needs your device location to function
This feature needs your device location to function
The Ketogenic Diet: A Detailed Beginner\'s Guide to Keto
The ketogenic diet (or keto diet, for short) is a low-carb, high-fat diet that offers many health benefits. \n\n Here is a detailed beginner’s guide to the keto diet......
The Paleo Diet — A Beginner\'s Guide Plus Meal Plan

The paleo diet is designed to resemble what human hunter-gatherer ancestors ate thousands of years ago, consisting mainly of lean meats, fish, fruits, vegetables, nuts and seeds. \n\n Here is a detailed beginner’s guide to the paleo diet......
The Vegetarian Diet: A Beginner\'s Guide and Meal Plan

Vegetarianism is the practice of following a plant-based diet with or without the inclusion of dairy and eggs. 

 Switching to a vegetarian diet helps lower cholesterol, control diabetes, prevent cancer, and retain vitamins. 

 Here is a detailed beginner’s guide to the vegetarian diet......
Mediterranean Diet 101: A Meal Plan and Beginner\'s Guide

A Mediterranean diet incorporates the traditional healthy living habits of people from countries bordering the Mediterranean Sea, including France, Greece, Italy and Spain. \n\n Here is a detailed beginner’s guide to the Mediterranean diet......
